resources.string:
Welcome to Argharupa's Twitter Lite :)


 1) If you don't have any account in Twitter Lite, please Sign up.

 2) If you already have an account, just login with it.

 3)To go back to the Sign up/ login Activity, tap on the green floating button.

 4) Now you can follow or unfollow people from the user list as your wish by simply tap on them.

 5)There is a menu at the top right corner.

 *Tweet: You can tweet something here !

 *Your feed: You can see the tweets of the people you follow.

 *Your Tweet: You can see your own tweets.

 *Logout: you can logout from the current account.

 6) In Your tweet activity you can delete one of your tweets(if you no longer want it to share with us :( ) by long pressing on it.

 7) By taping on the floating button you can switch between Light mode and Dark mode.

 HOPE YOU WILL ENJOY MY APP :)
